strings.string: TUR_Installation enables you to setup your STB - Antenna, Channel, Satellite, Transponder, CAS, etc
TUR_The Archive allows you to playback or delete the programs you have recorded
TUR_The EPG displays program information in time and date order and here you can record them
TUR_The Channel List provides you with functions such as sorting and editing TV & Radio channel list
TUR_The Media Center allows you to browse and view videos, photos, and music from your storage
TUR_STB Info provides the STB status including product name and number, free disk space, etc
TUR_Return to the screen after hiding the main menu
TUR_Get current weather and weather forecast for thousands of cities around the world
TUR_View your pictures as a slideshow with nice transition effects
TUR_Organize your video content by information associated with the video files
TUR_Organize your music collection by information stored in your music file ID tag, like title, artist, album, genre and popularity
TUR_Add-ons are packages that add features and functions not normally included with the XBMC Media Center
TUR_Most of the Media Center's settings can be configured via the GUI under Settings
TUR_The File Manager lets you transfer, copy, delete and rename files and folders on your disk drive, FTP-shares, etc
TUR_System Info allows you to see your system status
TUR_Check your system resource at a glance
TUR_Set Current Position for East Limit
TUR_Set Current Position for West Limit
TUR_Do you want to stop the channel scan?
TUR_Channel search has failed to complete
TUR_Do you want to delete the selected file(s)?
TUR_You were unable to change the duration
TUR_A timer name must be at least %d characters long
TUR_You were unable to edit timer
TUR_The time you entered has already passed
TUR_Sorry, that's an irrelevant transponder frequency
TUR_Set Current Position as East Limit
TUR_Set Current Position as West Limit
TUR_You can setup Language, Video, Audio, Antenna, Satellite, Channel, Time and Date in the First Installation
TUR_Antenna Setup enables you to configure Tuner 1 and Tuner 2
TUR_Channel Search menu allows you to scan channels automatically or manually
TUR_You can add or delete a satellite here
TUR_Here you can add or delete transponders
TUR_Most of STB settings can be configured via the GUI under Configuration
TUR_The Conditional Access System allows you to setup Smartcard configurations
TUR_Do you want to apply the rotation limits above?
TUR_Select the satellite you want to configure
TUR_Select a frequency range sent by the receiver to the LNB
TUR_Select the LNB frequency to the LNB you are using
TUR_When set to 'On', LNBs will be switched between Low and High band
TUR_Select the transponder for the selected satellite
TUR_You can control the movements of the motorized antenna here
TUR_Set the East and West limit of the DiSEqC motor, in order to protect from damage due to obstacles
TUR_Press the OK button to apply the rotation limits for the motor
TUR_Try again after stopping the PVR first
TUR_You have reached the maximum number of\nrecordings allowed
TUR_Recording stopped due to insufficient disk space
TUR_There is no configured satellite in the list
TUR_Select satellites you wish to search from

TUR_When set to 'On', new channels are searched from existing transponders and the additional transponders that stored by transponder network however if you set this option to 'Off', only the transponder you selected will be searched
TUR_Select the type of channels you want to search for
TUR_Press the OK button to search channels
TUR_Set limits on your kids' STB use
TUR_Adjust settings for recording in STB
TUR_Set the system's digital audio output settings
TUR_Set the output settings for TVs that support HDMI cable
TUR_Set up or change network connections including wireless
TUR_Adjust settings related to the system's date and time
TUR_Delete eveything off your hard drive
TUR_Restore the system software to its default settings
TUR_Adjust additional settings for STB including fan speed control
TUR_It will take some time to bring up display changes
TUR_Please be patience after pressing the OK button
TUR_Sorry, that's an incorrect PIN code
TUR_The PIN code must be 4-digit long
TUR_Sorry, that PIN code does not match
TUR_Your PIN code has been changed successfully

TUR_DO YOU WANT TO FORMAT TO YOUR HDD DRIVE?

TUR_Select the language for the subtitle to be in
TUR_Select the language for the secondary subtitle to be in
TUR_Enter your PIN code to change the parental settings
TUR_Set a restriction for the main menu
TUR_Set an access restriction to chosen channels
TUR_When set to 'On', the STB automatically start a timeshift recording when a different channel is selected
TUR_Select the preferred size of timeshift buffer
TUR_Select recording duration for a channel that has no EPG info
TUR_Set the pre-recording time for a EPG channel
TUR_Set the post-recording time for a EPG channel
TUR_When set to 'On', Dolby Digital audio will be selected automatically when broadcast
TUR_Select a delay time for audio
TUR_Select the display format for TV screen
TUR_Set RGB or YUV for HDMI Color Space
TUR_Select Ethernet or Wireless for your network connection
TUR_Search Access Points around your STB
TUR_Enter the hidden SSID you wish to use
TUR_Enter the encryption key for wireless connection
TUR_Press the OK button to connect to the AP you have chosen
TUR_When set to 'DHCP', your IP address will be automatically allocated by the DHCP server
TUR_Press the OK button to save the IP address settings
TUR_When set to 'Automatic', the time and date will be obtained automatically from the channel that you select
TUR_Select a channel you want to set your time and date by
TUR_Set the time zone that will be the basis for the date and time display
TUR_When set to 'Automatic', the system automatically change over to summer time
TUR_Press the OK button to save time settings
TUR_Press the button to format Media section in your hard drive
TUR_Press the button to format Record section in your hard drive
TUR_Press the button to format all section in your hard drive
TUR_Go to First Installation after restoring system to the factory default
TUR_When set to 'On', the system switches to deep standby mode when you press the 'Power' button to help reduce the amount of electricity used
TUR_Set the time for swithcing into standby mode when not being used
TUR_Adjust the fan speed level for your system
TUR_Set the time for the channel info to be displayed when zapping
TUR_Set the time for the playback info to be displayed on the screen

TUR_When set to 'Separated', the Tuner 2 receives its own signal input however it will receive only the channel level currently being received by the Tuner 1 when this is set to 'Loopthrough'
TUR_When set to 'Same with Tuner 1', both tuners are connected to the same signal source
TUR_Select a control method for Tuner 1
TUR_You can add, delete or configure satellites here
TUR_Select a control method for Tuner 2
TUR_Go back to Video & Audio Setup

TUR_Go back to Antenna & Satellite Setup
TUR_When set to 'Automatic', the time will be obtained by the receiver automatically from a specific channel that you select
TUR_When set to 'Automatic', the system automatically change over to and from summer and winter time
